preserved_handlers.on_button1_click:
# Code for on_button1_click

    num1 = simpledialog.askinteger("Title", "Enter num1:")
    num2 = simpledialog.askinteger("Title", "Enter num2:")
    operator = simpledialog.askstring("Title", "Enter operator:")

    if operator == "+":
        result = num1 + num2
    else:
        result = "Unknown operator entered"

    messagebox.showinfo("Title", result)
